Phase 1 will involve the construction of a 285.6km-long superconductive maglev line, comprising 256.6km of tunnels, 23.6km of viaducts, 11.3km of bridges, and 4.1km of rail beds.. The Central Japan Railway Company [6] is the main railway company operating in the Chūbu region of central Japan.It is officially abbreviated in English as JR Central and occasionally as JR Tokai (Japanese: JR東海).
